poem:
Title: "The Weaving of Shoes and Souls"

In the rush of green currency,
The reed of dignity is bent,
The loom of dreams disgarded.
Wage threads unravel, tatter the web,
Vast machines hum the requiem of ancient hands. 
A thunder of footsteps, unheard,
Yet echoing across the neon path of plenty,
Uncelebrated champions running away,
In the wings of an uncrowned swoosh.
